about_the_game:
Indulge in a symphony of passion and elegance with House of Jigsaw: Romance DLC! Step into a world of love and tender beauty as you race against time to piece together enchanting, flower-themed puzzles. This DLC adds a touch of romantic allure to the House of Jigsaw universe, inviting you to show your puzzle-solving prowess amidst a garden of vibrant blossoms!

Prepare for a puzzle-solving adventure that celebrates the enduring magic of love in a way that is truly unforgettable. Can you solve the flower jigsaws in the shortest amount of time? Show your results on the community page.



  • Step into a world of love
  • Multiple puzzle selection
  • Cutouts up to 1000 pieces
  • Different edge cutouts
  • Change background color
  • Incredible zoom
  • Compare your time score with players on the community page
